author: Simon Difford
description: Dry and aromatic with vermouth and aromatised wine, along with rich orange liqueur, gently influencing scotch whisky, enlivened with a subtle black pepper bite.
name: Peat's Dragon
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Speyside single malt Scotch whisky
15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
15 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
